mapper.select: SELECT tu.userName,tp.plan_num,tt.true_num,tt.new_kehu,tt.old_kehu,tt.yixiang_kehu,tt.baofei,tp.start_time,tp.end_time from tb_plan tp LEFT JOIN tb_user tu on tp.sahngbaoren=tu.id LEFT JOIN tb_area ta on tu.area_id=ta.id LEFT JOIN tb_true tt on tu.id=tt.shijishangbaoren where tp.plan_dis=2 and ta.parentId=1

SELECT tu.userName,tp.plan_num,tt.true_num,tt.new_kehu,tt.old_kehu,tt.yixiang_kehu,tt.baofei,tp.start_time,tp.end_time from tb_plan tp LEFT JOIN tb_user tu on tp.sahngbaoren=tu.id LEFT JOIN tb_true tt on tu.id=tt.shijishangbaoren where tp.plan_dis=2 and tp.sahngbaoren=#{id}
